title: Belovy.PDTV.x264.AAC.MVGroup.Forum.mp4
description: Belovy Culture Documentary hosted by cast themselves, published by Lendoc Studios in 1992 - English narration [img]https://docuwiki.net/images/9/9f/Belovy-Cover.jpg[/img] Information ------------------------------ 'Belovy' (The Belovs) is a breathtaking portrait of a troubled peasant family. It's poetry in the form of a documentary that won many prizes. Beautifully shot in vintage black and white, the film tells the story of two times widow Anna Belova who lives together with her brother Mikhail. Blending the two personalities, Kosakovsky characterizes the true Russian soul: she is the rational worker, honest and strong - he is the drunken poet, the idealist, his philosophy fades into radical nonsense time after time.
